channel.title: [Delta] Eazyscape
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b635/x_9xp_x/Eazyscape_zpsec4247fb.png[/img][/center] [center][size=14pt]Hey sup guys started working on my crappy delta again this time im gunna be working to host it gunna be trying to make this delta the best i can and maybe see if it can keep up with most modern sources so what are some of the things i plan to add? [/size]
[ul][li]100% Skills And Combat - Progress [20%][/li] [li]Resource Collecting System (Basicly the whole server collects a certain amount of resources and gain a reward) - Progress [0%] [/li] [li]Game modes with different experience rates (Just the usual game modes) - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Prestige System with increased drop rates per prestige - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Player Count in server increases the exp rates at milestones - Progress [100%][/li] [li]A few new interfaces (New info tab ect..) - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Several new bosses and maybe some custom ones - Progress [5%][/li] [li]A couple custom items (nothing silly) - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Gunna add most minigames 100% (Gunna leave this till after the important stuff) - Progress [0000%][/li] [li]100% Npc clipping and follow clipping - Progress [50%] - Already done Npc clipping[/li] [li]Fix as many dupes as possible - Progress [N/A][/li] [li]Make delta as good as i can - Progress [0.5%] - Wont ever be 100% cause i will always try to improve[/li][/ul]
Media: [spoiler] Clipping [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b635/x_9xp_x/Clipping_zps10f30e78.png[/img] Package [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b635/x_9xp_x/package_zpsd6052ef3.png[/img] Cache Downloading [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b635/x_9xp_x/cachedl_zps93a2fc03.png[/img] [/spoiler] Want to help in any way or form? Send me a message on Skype: x_9xp_x Not got too many pictures atm but i will be adding more soon just bare with me i need to start adding stuff in as iv taken a long break from this source i had to use an outdated version of it because i accidentally deleted my main one i worked on for a long time. Update Log: [spoiler] *** 22 November 2014 *** [ul][li]Added auto cache downloading[/li] [li]Changed and fixed a bunch of stupid sprites[/li] [li]Added in PI like config.java to make life easy[/li] [li]General clearing of Client.java (removing stupid unused code ect)[/li][/ul] *** 24 November 2014 *** [ul][li]Packaged server files removed more useless code from Client.java[/li] [li]Removed Most skills from Client.java and made them there own class[/li] [li]Started work on Resource system (Added interface and got a basic system going)[/li] [li]Fixed Woodcutting And Mining[/li] [li]Fixed Nulled models in Client cache[/li][/ul] *** 25 / 26 November 2014 *** [ul][li]Worked On fixing clipping as it was bugged[/li] [li]Did some more cleaning of junk out of the client. size went from 600kb to 499kb[/li] [li]Didnt have much time in these 2 days ;P[/li][/ul] [/spoiler] What did i start off with? Client: [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,624744.msg4254511.html#msg4254511]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,624744.msg4254511.html#msg4254511[/url] Source: [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,640857.msg4317859.html#msg4317859]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,640857.msg4317859.html#msg4317859[/url] -- Developers -- 9xp - Main Developer (Server / Client Sided). Straw-Berry - Developer (Server Sided). [/center]

item.title: [Delta] Eazyscape
item.dc:creator: @x_9xp_x x_9xp_x
item.description:
@x_9xp_x wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Hey sup guys started working on my crappy delta again this time im gunna be working to host it gunna be trying to make this delta the best i can and maybe see if it can keep up with most modern sources so what are some of the things i plan to add?
[/size]

[ul][li]100% Skills And Combat - Progress [20%][/li] [li]Resource Collecting System (Basicly the whole server collects a certain amount of resources and gain a reward) - Progress [0%] [/li] [li]Game modes with different experience rates (Just the usual game modes) - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Prestige System with increased drop rates per prestige - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Player Count in server increases the exp rates at milestones - Progress [100%][/li] [li]A few new interfaces (New info tab ect..) - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Several new bosses and maybe some custom ones - Progress [5%][/li] [li]A couple custom items (nothing silly) - Progress [0%][/li] [li]Gunna add most minigames 100% (Gunna leave this till after the important stuff) - Progress [0000%][/li] [li]100% Npc clipping and follow clipping - Progress [50%] - Already done Npc clipping[/li] [li]Fix as many dupes as possible - Progress [N/A][/li] [li]Make delta as good as i can - Progress [0.5%] - Wont ever be 100% cause i will always try to improve[/li][/ul]

Media:
[spoiler]
Clipping

Package

Cache Downloading


[/spoiler]

Want to help in any way or form?

Send me a message on Skype:
x_9xp_x

Not got too many pictures atm but i will be adding more soon just bare with me i need to start adding stuff in as iv taken a long break from this source i had to use an outdated version of it because i accidentally deleted my main one i worked on for a long time.

Update Log:
[spoiler]
*** 22 November 2014 ***

[ul][li]Added auto cache downloading[/li]
[li]Changed and fixed a bunch of stupid sprites[/li]
[li]Added in PI like config.java to make life easy[/li]
[li]General clearing of Client.java (removing stupid unused code ect)[/li][/ul]

*** 24 November 2014 ***

[ul][li]Packaged server files removed more useless code from Client.java[/li]
[li]Removed Most skills from Client.java and made them there own class[/li]
[li]Started work on Resource system (Added interface and got a basic system going)[/li]
[li]Fixed Woodcutting And Mining[/li]
[li]Fixed Nulled models in Client cache[/li][/ul]

*** 25 / 26 November 2014 ***

[ul][li]Worked On fixing clipping as it was bugged[/li]
[li]Did some more cleaning of junk out of the client. size went from 600kb to 499kb[/li]
[li]Didnt have much time in these 2 days ;P[/li][/ul]

[/spoiler]

What did i start off with?

Client: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,624744.msg4254511.html#msg4254511

Source: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,640857.msg4317859.html#msg4317859

– Developers –

9xp - Main Developer (Server / Client Sided).
Straw-Berry - Developer (Server Sided).

[/center]
